Reviews.Title: above average.
Reviews.Author: Tudor Baciu
Reviews.Content: Long lasting battery, good build quality but some problems with installation of my favorites apps. Some of them doesn't work. I ask developers and they told me : this model is not supported :(. Anyhow is great value for money. Is necessary to replace factory ROM because of Chinese language, which is present in every corner.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo P780
Reviews.Author: tarek farag
Reviews.Content: I love this phone it is excellent in everything except the memory 4 GB only in the Indian version 8 gigabytes purchased from Amazon India

Reviews.Title: troublesome since it needs root
Reviews.Author: Zaki A. Z. Alshaker "zaki67"
Reviews.Content: This is a Chinese market phone that has been rooted to enable gaps ,this makes life harder and updates nearly impossible since you lose root if you update .Also there are many apps in Chinese that keep popping up.

Reviews.Title: excellent smartphone for this price
Reviews.Author: Gleb
Reviews.Content: Battery is awesome - about 2-4 days (any my previous smartphones have 1-1.5 days battery life or less), I was try to drain it and the anti-record was almost 2 days, it's amazing.Love this phone and I'm bought one more for my wife.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Ahmsw
Reviews.Content: I like it because 4000mAp battery long lifeThe phone design is greatVery fast deviceI recommend it to who want long battery life with best performance that found in the market

Reviews.Title: Lenovo P780
Reviews.Author: Mo Ko
Reviews.Content: It's a great dual SIM phone. The battery life is simply amazing and the phone is fast. I'm very impressed!
